DOC.detailed_description: Patients recruit university 's employee student population advertising university . Patients shoulder complaint ( describe pain felt shoulder upper arm ) randomly assign either manual palpation deep dry needle group . Participants randomly divide 2 group , deep dry needle group manual palpation group . Visual analogue scale ( VAS ) , refer pain ( ReP ) pattern feature refer pain infraspinatus muscle assess post-technique .
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 65 year . To remain seated front data visualization screen ( tablet , computer smartphones ) least 4 hour day . Shoulder complaint last six week . Patients evidence serious medical illness . Cognitive impairment . Psychosocial disorder . Bilateral affectation shoulder pain . Pregnancy .
